name: National Law School of India University
desc: National Law School of India University, located in Bengaluru, Karnataka, is a premier institution for legal education in India. With a focus on academic excellence and practical training, it produces legal professionals equipped to excel in various fields of law.

name: National Law University
desc: National Law University, situated in New Delhi, Delhi, is a leading institution known for its rigorous legal education and research. With state-of-the-art facilities and renowned faculty, it prepares students for successful careers in the legal profession.

name: Symbiosis Law School
desc: Symbiosis Law School, located in Pune, Maharashtra, is a renowned institution offering quality legal education and practical training. With a focus on holistic development and experiential learning, it prepares students for dynamic roles in the legal field.

name: Nalsar University of Law
desc: Nalsar University of Law, situated in Hyderabad, Telangana, is a prestigious institution known for its academic excellence and research contributions in the field of law. With a focus on interdisciplinary learning and practical training, it prepares students for leadership roles in the legal profession.

name: The West Bengal National University of Juridicial Sciences
desc: The West Bengal National University of Juridical Sciences, located in Kolkata, West Bengal, is a leading institution for legal education known for its academic rigor and research culture. With a focus on interdisciplinary learning and experiential training, it prepares students for diverse careers in the legal field.

name: Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur
desc: Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur, located in Kharagpur, West Bengal, is one of the premier technical institutes in India. With a focus on academic excellence and research innovation, it prepares students for leadership roles in engineering and technology.

name: Jamia Millia Islamia, New Delhi
desc: Jamia Millia Islamia, situated in New Delhi, Delhi, is a renowned institution known for its academic diversity and cultural richness. With a focus on holistic development and social responsibility, it prepares students for success in their chosen fields.

name: Gujarat National Law University
desc: Gujarat National Law University, located in Gandhinagar, Gujarat, is a premier institution for legal education known for its academic excellence and research contributions. With a focus on practical training and industry collaborations, it prepares students for successful careers in law and allied fields.

name: Siksha `O` Anusandhan
desc: Siksha 'O' Anusandhan, located in Bhubaneswar, Odisha, is a leading institution known for its academic excellence and research-oriented programs. With a focus on innovation and industry interface, it prepares students to excel in their chosen fields and contribute to societal development.

name: National Law University, Jodhpur
desc: National Law University, Jodhpur, situated in Jodhpur, Rajasthan, is a premier institution for legal education known for its academic rigor and research-oriented programs. With a focus on experiential learning and interdisciplinary approach, it prepares students for dynamic roles in the legal profession.

name: Saveetha Institute of Medical and Technical Sciences
